results.title: Effect of atenolol in angina pectoris of effort.
results.text_hl: ...The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, a new cardioselective beta-adrenogenic blocking agent, was studied in 11 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Neurocirculatory_Asthenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009449 @@@angina of effort@@@ in a double-bind trial involving monitored exercise tolerance tests.

citations.NLM: Hernández-Cañero A, González A, Cardonne A, Pérez-Medina T, Garcia-Barreto D. Effect of atenolol in angina pectoris of effort. Cor Vasa. 1972;20(2):99-103. PMID: 4499921

results.title: [Antianginal and hemodynamic effect of propranolol and atenolol in patients with exertion angina].
results.journal: Biull Vsesoiuznogo Kardiol Nauchn Tsentra AMN SSSR
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Neurocirculatory_Asthenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009449 @@@angina of effort@@@, the changes of the central hemodynamic indices were estimated after oral administration of effective antianginal doses of @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ and the cardioselective beta-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, which had been individually selected.

results.title: Double-blind trial comparing labetalol with atenolol in the treatment of systemic hypertension with angina pectoris.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were then randomized for 4 weeks to active @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ plus 2 tablets of @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@ placebo, or active @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@ (200 mg twice daily) plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ placebo, then crossed over and then changed back to active @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ without @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@ placebo; the observers were unblinded in the last period.

citations.NLM: Jee LD, Opie LH. Double-blind trial comparing labetalol with atenolol in the treatment of systemic hypertension with angina pectoris. Am J Cardiol. 1985 Sep 15;56(8):551-4. PMID: 3929584

results.title: Effects of antianginal therapy with atenolol and slow-release nifedipine on respiratory gas exchange and on the ventilatory requirements for aerobic exercise.
results.text_hl: ...The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ on gas exchange were studied in 27 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Neurocirculatory_Asthenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009449 @@@effort angina@@@ in a randomized cross-over trial.

results.title: [The comparison of the efficacy of atenolol and isosorbide dinitrate therapy in chronic hypotension patients with stable angina pectoris].
results.text_hl: Antianginal efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (A) and @CHEMICAL_Isosorbide_Dinitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007548 @@@isosorbide dinitrate@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Isosorbide_Dinitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007548 @@@ID@@@) was compared in a long-term randomized, single-blind, crossover, placebo controlled trial in 71 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with combined @DISEASE_Angina_Stable @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina pectoris@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@chronic hypotension@@@ (Hpts) and in 38 normotensive @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Neurocirculatory_Asthenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009449 @@@angina of effort@@@ (Npts).

citations.NLM: Idrisova EM, Borovkova NV, Stepacheva TA, Chernov VI, Karpov RS. [The comparison of the efficacy of atenolol and isosorbide dinitrate therapy in chronic hypotension patients with stable angina pectoris]. Klin Med (Mosk). 2001;79(1):37-40. PMID: 11234265
